Text:
Thank you so much! I have been looking for this, and thanks to you I could finally see it. 

The translation is not too bad. I made some corrections, and while it is still not perfect, my version is here: http://subscene.com/english/The-Needle-Igla/subtitle-166118.aspx

Thanks a lot.

Any idea if it's possible to find the short movie "Yahha" somewhere on the net? The same director...
